name: Moonlight Sonata
description:
Play as a block in the small town of Blocksylvania, a town of mayhem. Avoid being killed by other blocks in the block gangwars of the streets of Blocksylvania. Follow a four sided trail to liberation as your assailants continue to fight it out in this bizarre quadrilateral. Block bullets from block shotguns blowing off blockfaces, non stop action. Be there, or be a block.

Our next game is due to be released later this year. For now, we hope you enjoy this one. Thanks for taking a look. XOXO

CREDITS: CODE, ART & DESIGN - Jim Lessels - ITCH.IO SYNOPSIS - Ben Van Eijk - CHIEF TESTER - Ben Van Eijk - TESTING - David Mckay, Peter Stirling - MUSIC - Aaron Kenny, Doug Maxwell, Kevin MacLeod, Matthew Pablo, Quincas Moreira - SOUND EFFECTS - Mark DiAngelo, Ertfelda, RA The Sun God, soundbible.com, freesfx.co.uk
